queries.description: The value of an expression shall be the same under any order of evaluation that the standard permits.
queries.name: The value of an expression does not rely on the order of evaluation

A5-0-1.title: The value of an expression shall be the same under any order of evaluation that the standard permits.

queries.description: The operands of a logical && or || shall be parenthesized if the operands contain binary operators to make the expressions more readable.
queries.name: The operands of a logical && or || shall be parenthesized if the operands contain binary operators

A5-2-6.title: The operands of a logical && or || shall be parenthesized if the operands contain binary operators.

queries.description: The explicit creation of a temporary object without usage that will be destroyed at the end of the full expression might be inconsistent with the developer's intentions.
queries.name: Expression statements shall not be explicit calls to constructors of temporary objects only

A6-2-2.title: Expression statements shall not be explicit calls to constructors of temporary objects only.

queries.description: The use of parentheses should be used to override or emphasize operator precedence. However, gratuitous use of parentheses can decrease code readability.
queries.name: Limited dependence should be placed on C++ operator precedence rules in expressions

queries.description: The use of parentheses can be used to emphasize precedence and increase code readability.
queries.name: Limited dependence should be placed on C++ operator precedence rules in expressions

M5-0-2.title: Limited dependence should be placed on C++ operator precedence rules in expressions.

queries.description: The increment (++) and decrement (--) operators shall not be mixed with other operators in an expression.
queries.name: The increment (++) and decrement (--) operators shall not be mixed with other operators

M5-2-10.title: The increment (++) and decrement (--) operators shall not be mixed with other operators in an expression.

queries.description: Assigning values in a sub-expression add additional side-effects that potentially results in values inconsistent with the developers expectations.
queries.name: Assignment operators shall not be used in sub-expressions

M6-2-1.title: Assignment operators shall not be used in sub-expressions.
